thread.section_title: Kauai News | The Garden Island Newspaper
thread.title: December 29, 2023 - The Garden Island

title: December 29, 2023 - The Garden Island
text: [Huge surf pounds West Coast and Hawaii, flooding some low-lying areas](https://www.thegardenisland.com/2023/12/29/hawaii-news/huge-surf-pounds-west-coast-and-hawaii-flooding-some-low-lying-areas/) LOS ANGELES — Powerful surf rolled onto beaches on the West Coast and Hawaii on Thursday as a big swell generated by the stormy Pacific Ocean pushed toward shorelines, causing localized flooding. [‘Too Much Life’ to premiere at Kaua‘i War Memorial Convention Hall](https://www.thegardenisland.com/2023/12/29/entertainment/too-much-life-to-premiere-at-kauai-war-memorial-convention-hall/) LIHU‘E — A feature film, “Too Much Life,” is scheduled to premiere on Friday at Kaua‘i War Memorial Convention Hall. [Kapa‘a holds off Waimea 60-57 in KIF girls basketball](https://www.thegardenisland.com/2023/12/29/sports/kapaa-holds-off-waimea-60-57-in-kif-girls-basketball/) WAIMEA — The Kapa‘a High School girls basketball team escaped with a 60-57 win over Waimea High School in a Kaua‘i Interscholastic Federation game in Waimea. [Happy Camper for Friday, December 29, 2023](https://www.thegardenisland.com/2023/12/29/lifestyles/happy-camper-for-friday-december-29-2023/) Congratulations to Elliot Lucas and Edwin Sawyer on hosting the premiere of “Too Much Life” on Friday, starting at 6 p.m. at Kaua‘i War Memorial Convention Hall. [Home sales hold steady, price eases](https://www.thegardenisland.com/2023/12/29/hawaii-news/home-sales-hold-steady-price-eases/) LIHU‘E — A weary housing market showed a spark of life in the penultimate month of 2023, as sales of single-family homes were on par with the same period a year earlier on the island of Kaua‘i. [Obituaries for Friday, December 29, 2023](https://www.thegardenisland.com/2023/12/29/obituaries/obituaries-for-friday-december-29-2023/) • Remedios ‘Remy’ Bautista Guyang • Steven Mitsuo Saiki • Moises Magen Lemi Jr. • Genevieve Delanoza • Fred J. Bermudez
